languages.text: "Мне известно о том, что род Зауэрбэк предлагал свою помощь семейству Гапрак, и погибший Гален Гапрак, судя по всему, принял эту помощь. Думаю, что и к его смерти причастны вы".
languages.translation_comment: Если нашли след от инъектора и видели барк Table_Abelard_Bark или Table_Jae_Bark (153689160efc0fb47828fbc40eb6fd42) / сын Махария нам признался

traits.locale_text: "Мне известно о том, что род Зауэрбек предлагал свою помощь семейству Гапрак, и погибший Гален Гапрак, судя по всему, принял эту помощь. Думаю, что и к его смерти причастны вы".

languages.text: "I know that House Sauerback offered their help to the Gapraks and the late Halen Gaprak seemed to have accepted the offer. I suspect that you are responsible for his death as well."
languages.original_text: "Мне известно о том, что род Зауэрбэк предлагал свою помощь семейству Гапрак, и погибший Гален Гапрак, судя по всему, принял эту помощь. Думаю, что и к его смерти причастны вы".

traits.locale_text: "I know that House Sauerback offered their help to the Gapraks, and it seems that the late Halen Gaprak accepted the offer. I suspect that you are responsible for his death as well."
"I know that House Sauerback offered their help to the Gapraks, and it seems that the late Halen Gaprak accepted the offer. I suspect that you are responsible for his death as well."
"I know that House Sauerback offered their help to the Gapraks and the late Halen Gaprak seemed to have accepted the offer. I suspect that you are responsible for his death as well."
"I know that House Sauerback offered their help to the Gapraks and the late Halen Gaprak seemed to have accepted the offer. I suspect that you are responsible for his death as well."
"I know that House Sauerback offered their help to the Gapraks and the late Halen Gaprak seemed to have accepted the offer. I suspect that you are responsible for his death as well."
"I know that House Sauerback offered their help to the Gapraks and the late Halen Gaprak seemed to have accepted the offer. I suspect that you are responsible for his death as well."

languages.text: 「ザウアーバック家がギャプラック家と故ヘイレン・ギャプラックに助力を申し出て、それを受諾したことはわかっている。お前は彼の死にも関与しているのではないか？」
languages.original_text: "I know that House Sauerback offered their help to the Gapraks and the late Halen Gaprak seemed to have accepted the offer. I suspect that you are responsible for his death as well."

traits.locale_text: 「ザウアーバック家がギャプラック家と故ヘイレン・ギャプラックに助力を申し出て、それを受諾したことはわかっている。お前は彼の死にも関与しているのではないか？」

languages.text: “我知道苏尔贝克家族曾提出要帮助贾帕克家族，而那位死去的哈伦·贾帕克似乎接受了他们的帮助。我怀疑，你们得为他的死负责。”
languages.original_text: "I know that House Sauerback offered their help to the Gapraks and the late Halen Gaprak seemed to have accepted the offer. I suspect that you are responsible for his death as well."

traits.locale_text: “我知道苏尔贝克家族曾提出要帮助贾帕克家族，而那位死去的哈伦·贾帕克似乎接受了他们的帮助。我怀疑，你们得为他的死负责。”

languages.text: « Je sais que la maison Sauerback a proposé son aide aux Gaprak et qu'Halen Gaprak avait accepté son offre avant de mourir. Je suspecte d'ailleurs que vous n'êtes pas étrangers à son décès. »
languages.original_text: "I know that House Sauerback offered their help to the Gapraks and the late Halen Gaprak seemed to have accepted the offer. I suspect that you are responsible for his death as well."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais que la maison Sauerback a proposé son aide aux Gaprak et qu'Halen Gaprak avait accepté son offre avant de mourir. Je suspecte d'ailleurs que vous n'êtes pas étrangers à son décès. »

languages.text: «Sé que la casa Sauerback ofreció su ayuda a los Gaprak y que el difunto Halen Gaprak parecía haber aceptado la oferta. Sospecho que también son responsables de su muerte».
languages.original_text: "I know that House Sauerback offered their help to the Gapraks and the late Halen Gaprak seemed to have accepted the offer. I suspect that you are responsible for his death as well."

traits.locale_text: «Sé que la casa Sauerback ofreció su ayuda a los Gaprak y que el difunto Halen Gaprak parecía haber aceptado la oferta. Sospecho que también son responsables de su muerte».

languages.text: "Ich weiß, dass Haus Sauerback den Gapraks seine Hilfe angeboten hat, und der verstorbene Halen Gaprak scheint das Angebot angenommen zu haben. Ich vermute, dass Ihr auch für seinen Tod verantwortlich seid."
languages.original_text: "I know that House Sauerback offered their help to the Gapraks and the late Halen Gaprak seemed to have accepted the offer. I suspect that you are responsible for his death as well."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, dass Haus Sauerback den Gapraks seine Hilfe angeboten hat, und der verstorbene Halen Gaprak scheint das Angebot angenommen zu haben. Ich vermute, dass Ihr auch für seinen Tod verantwortlich seid."

languages.text: "Sauerback Hanesi, Gaprak tarafına yardım teklif etmiş. Halen Gaprak da teklifi kabul etmiş, bu kadarını biliyorum. Şüphelendiğim kadarıyla onun ölümünden de sen sorumlusun."
languages.original_text: "I know that House Sauerback offered their help to the Gapraks and the late Halen Gaprak seemed to have accepted the offer. I suspect that you are responsible for his death as well."

traits.locale_text: "Sauerback Hanesi Gaprak tarafına yardım teklif etmiş ve Halen Gaprak teklifi kabul etmiş, bu kadarını biliyorum. Şüphelendiğim kadarıyla onun ölümünden de sen sorumlusun."
